subject: Soccer
Women's World Cup (Soccer)
lead_paragraph: Germany beat Ivory Coast in a 10-0 rout, the second-most lopsided win in the history of the Women’s World Cup, and Norway dominated Thailand, 4-0.
snippet: Germany beat Ivory Coast in a 10-0 rout, the second-most lopsided win in the history of the Women’s World Cup, and Norway dominated Thailand, 4-0.
